name: List

props.name: hoverable
props.description: If `undefined`, non-striped lists hover by default.

props.name: reorderable
props.description: Allow drag-and-drop style reordering via pointer (default: true)

props.name: focusMode
props.description:
Focus behavior for rows.
- `auto` (default): non-selectable lists keep rows out of the tab order; selectable lists use roving focus (one row has `tabIndex=0`, rest `-1`).
- `row`: every row is tabbable (`tabIndex=0`). Opt-in only; not recommended for long lists.
- `none`: rows are not in the tab order (`tabIndex=-1`), allowing programmatic focus only.

props.name: getKey
props.description: Provide stable keys for items (defaults to index).

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

bestPractices: Use for simple rows such as menus, settings, or short feeds; keep each row self‑contained.
Prefer succinct labels with optional secondary text; avoid deep nested interactivity inside rows.
Use selection or navigation patterns consistently (radio/checkbox icons vs chevrons).
Keep item height comfortable for touch; use tokenized spacing for density.
Defer dense tabular data to `Table` and two‑dimensional layouts to `Grid`.
Non‑selectable lists keep rows out of the tab order by default for accessibility; opt into `focusMode="row"` only when you truly need every row tabbable.
